headlines.headline: Stephen A.: We got the effort we've been asking for at NBA All-Star Game
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith praises the effort he saw from the players at the NBA's All-Star Game.

headlines.headline: Perk: Adam Silver has found the recipe for the All-Star Game
headlines.description: Kendrick Perkins and Brian Windhorst join "Get Up" to praise Adam Silver for the success of the new All-Star Game format.

headlines.headline: Kendrick Perkins: The new All-Star Game format is a joy to watch
headlines.description: Kendrick Perkins gives his thoughts on the new format of the NBA All-Star Game.

headlines.headline: Jaylen Brown: Beverly Hills' explanation for event shutdown 'false'
headlines.description: Celtics star Jaylen Brown said the City of Beverly Hills' explanation for shutting down his brand event Saturday night was "completely false."

headlines.headline: Ant Edwards explains why he enjoyed the All-Star Game's competitiveness
headlines.description: Anthony Edwards tells Malika Andrews why he enjoyed the NBA All-Star Game's competitiveness this year.

headlines.headline: NBA All-Star 2026: Best moments, highlights from Los Angeles
headlines.description: All of the top moments and results from NBA All-Star Weekend in Inglewood, California.

headlines.headline: Dolphins releasing pass rusher Bradley Chubb, source says
headlines.description: The Dolphins are releasing pass rusher Bradley Chubb after four seasons with the franchise, a source confirmed to ESPN.

headlines.headline: Would it make sense for Ravens to consider trading Lamar Jackson?
headlines.description: Mike Tannenbaum and Domonique Foxworth weigh in on whether the Ravens could make Lamar Jackson available for trade this offseason.

headlines.headline: Are the Giants overhyped heading into next season?
headlines.description: Mike Tannenbaum, Domonique Foxworth and Dan Graziano discuss the Giants' potential for next season.

headlines.headline: Who are the current NFL team owners?
headlines.description: NFL team owners carry a variety of reputations in the public eye. Who is in charge of your favorite franchises? Check out this list for more details.

headlines.headline: 2026 NFL offseason: Trade proposals that fit for both teams
headlines.description: DJ Moore and A.J. Brown to the AFC West? Kyler Murray in a new offense? Rams going all-in again? And a new WR1 for the Bills? Let's build 11 win-win deals.

headlines.headline: How will George Pickens' free agency play out with Cowboys?
headlines.description: Will Jerry Jones use the franchise tag on Pickens? What would a long-term deal look like?

headlines.headline: Olympics 2026 men's hockey: Standings, stats, schedule, more
headlines.description: Find the full schedule, scoring and goaltending leaders and group standings here.

headlines.headline: Brock Faber after USA's win: We have the right guys to go the distance
headlines.description: Brock Faber talks about the intensity of a win-or-go-home game and the success this Olympic team can have.

headlines.headline: Kings confirm Kevin Fiala out for rest of regular season
headlines.description: Kevin Fiala's leg surgery following his injury in the Olympics while playing for Switzerland was successful, the Kings announced Sunday, and the 29-year-old star forward will sit out the rest of the regular season as L.A. battles for a playoff spot.

headlines.headline: U.S. men's hockey stays unbeaten at Olympics; knockout round next
headlines.description: Auston Matthews scored twice and set up Zach Werenski's goal with a textbook pass, Connor Hellebuyck stopped 23 of the 24 shots he faced, and the U.S. defeated Germany 5-1 on Sunday night to finish group play at the Olympics unbeaten.

headlines.headline: Grades, questions from Team USA's Olympic hockey win vs. Germany
headlines.description: An American win seemed inevitable, sending the team through to the quarterfinals. Here's what stood out the most.

headlines.headline: 2026 Olympics: Top moments from USA-Germany men's hockey
headlines.description: With Sunday's win, the U.S. has clinched a spot in the quarterfinals. Catch all the goals and top plays here.
